resources.string: Do you really want to go back to the main menu?
Do you really want to create the player \'
Are you sure to save the changes made to player \'
Do you really want to delete the selected game?
Do you really want to delete the selected player? This also deletes every saved game where this player took part. This step cannot be undone.
Please choose at least two players to continue.
Do you really want to close the application?
Are you sure you want to create a backup from the active database? The current database backup will be replaced.
Do you really want to finish the current game?
Please enter a game name to continue.
This menu point show the dialog \'Backup\', in which you can either create or restore a database backup.
This menu point opens the game history. Every completed game from the past is listed here.

This parameter sets the game mode. There are four different game modes, which in general define the turn order. The game mode \'Chess\' also prevents the automatic pausing of the game on a player change.
This parameter sets the game name.
This parameter sets the maximum playing time. The game is automatically finished after the time is over.
This menu point opens the main menu. If needed, a running game can be saved beforehand.
This menu point opens the player management. Here, new player profiles can be created and existing profiles can be modified or deleted.
This parameter defines the time per round/turn available to a player. The game is automatically finished after the time is over.
This parameter defines the time a player gets added at the beginning of a new round/turn.
Are you sure you want to import the current database backup from external storage? The active database will be replaced.
Do you really want to quit the current game?
More information can be found on:

This permission is used to retrieve contact data from your address book to create new players. If not granted, the button "Contacts" in the menu "Player Management" is not visible and it is not possible to create new player profiles based on contact data.

This permission is used to restore backups saved on your external storage. If not granted, the button "Import Database Backup" in the menu "Backup" is not visible and it is not possible to import database backups from external storage.

This permission is used to create and save backups on your external storage. If not granted, the button "Export Database Backup" in the menu "Backup" is not visible and it is not possible to create and save database backups on external storage.
Please choose a game from the list.
This application belongs to the Privacy Friendly Apps.
Do you want to save the current game before leaving?
Do you really want to remove the selected entry from history?
Please set a game time and round time of at least 1 seconds to continue.
Are you sure you want to save the current game?
Welcome to Privacy Friendly Board Game Clock!
Press the button \'New Game\' at the main menu to start a new game.
After setting the game parameters you can create an unlimited amount of player profiles and add them to the game afterwards.
The player profiles remain saved and can be modified at the menu \'Player Management\' later on.
